summary.span: 为无线标记语言 (WML) 设备适配器集提供对象列表适配器类。

span.span: Provides an object list adapter class for the Wireless Markup Language (WML) device adapter set.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WML 对象列表适配器使用的辅助用户界面 (UI) 功能跨多个屏幕中呈现的控件。The WML object list adapter uses secondary user interface (UI) features to render the control across multiple screens.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CreateTemplatedUI(bool doDataBind) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub CreateTemplatedUI (doDataBind As Boolean)

param.name: doDataBind
param.span: 如果为 ，则实例化的模板必须绑定到可用数据（通常发生在第一个请求中）。

span.span: If , the instantiated templates bind to available data (which usually happens on the first request).

param.span: 如果为 ，则模板不会绑定到数据，而需要根据视图状态进行填充（通常在后续回发时发生）。

span.span: If , the templates do not bind to data, and instead rely on view state to fill them in (which usually happens on subsequent postbacks).

Protected Overridable Function ShouldRenderAsTable () As Boolean
abstract member ShouldRenderAsTable : unit -> bool override this.ShouldRenderAsTable : unit -> bool

summary.span: 返回一个 值，该值指示该列表是否必须呈现为表。

span.span: Returns a that indicates whether the list must be rendered as a table.

summary.span: 此 API 已过时。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

returns.span: 如果该列表必须呈现为表，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the list must be rendered as a table; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要更改的方式呈现列表视图时，可以重写此方法。This method can be overridden in order to change the manner in which the list view is rendered. > [!NOTE] > 即使方法将返回`true`、 目标设备可能不支持表、 在这种情况下将不会在列表视图呈现为表。Even if the method returns `true`, the target device might not support tables, in which case the list view will not be rendered as a table. 方法将返回`Boolean`，该值指示是否指定的表是否适合于目标设备屏幕上，而(继承自) 的类返回`Boolean`，指示设备是否在所有支持的表。The method returns a `Boolean` that indicates whether the specified table will fit on the target device screen, whereas the (inherited from ) of the class returns a `Boolean` that indicates whether the device supports tables at all.

related.span: 自适应控件行为的体系结构概述
